title: Running Bare
description: Book five in the Bare Love series. After coming face-to-face with the woman he believes to be his niece, Jack Madigan looks for answers about his brother who died long ago. His search leads him to a town known as Hidden Falls and a woman who sets his body on fire with a raging lust that just might lead to love. Julia White is already behind on missing-persons cases at the Hidden Falls Police Department. Then she has a one-night stand with a stranger she canâ€™t get out of her mind. He makes her body burn with unquenchable desire. Sex with him is a full-body experience that she never wants to end. Hidden Falls, the place where people go to disappear. And where some discover more than they ever imagined.
author: Lacey Thorn
